ref: 1418 āvartá m. ʻ whirlpool ʼ ŚBr., ʻ revolving ʼ R., ʻ crowded place where many men live together ʼ lex. [√vr̥t1]
Pa. āvaṭṭa -- m. ʻ turning, circuit, eddy ʼ;
Pk. āvatta -- , āvaṭṭa -- m. ʻ circular motion, a sort of village ʼ;
A. āuṭi ʻ a partic. quarter of a town or village ʼ;
G. ã̄ṭɔ m. ʻ turn, twist ʼ;
M. āṭā m. ʻ turn with a rope round a post, hoop, ring, frame of an umbrella ʼ;
Si. avaṭa ʻ circular, surrounding ʼ, adv. ʻ around ʼ.
